ygData.subject: Re: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The impression I got based on some talk on a web board is that the new songs interact with some new feature(s) that will be added to the game at large at
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 10 Nov 1999, Bard wrote:
>
> So in other words, we have payed for, and are playing, an unfinished class
> (Hmmm... I just figured it was a given that when you play a certain magical
> class, that all spells/songs were ALREADY in the game)? I wonder how
> quickly this would have been fixed if druids or wizards had a few spells
> missing (or in their case, circles of spells).
> Just had to gripe.

The impression I got based on some talk on a web board is that
the new songs interact with some new feature(s) that will be
added to the game at large at the time of the expansion.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
